failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on: https://www.metaweather.com/api/location/search/?query=san The response we received from your web server was: > 404: Not Found This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`. If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false` ----------------------------------------------------------- The request we sent was: Method: GET URL: https://www.metaweather.com/api/location/search/?query=san Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/7.7.0 Chrome/89.0.4328.0 Electron/12.0.0-beta.14 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate" } ----------------------------------------------------------- The response we got was: Status: 404 - Not Found Headers: { "content-length": "272", "content-type": "text/html; charset=UTF-8", "date": "Wed, 14 Dec 2022 13:32:26 GMT" } Body: 404 Page not found

Error: Page not found
